item.title: Create a Self Signed Certificate
item.description: Create root CA (Do this once) Create key for root CA 1 2 3 # Generate the private key for CA, which is used to sign certificates from others. # Remove `-des3` if dont want to protect the key with password. openssl genrsa -des3 -out root_ca.key 4096 Create root CA certificate and self sign it 1 2 openssl req -x509 -new -nodes -key root_ca.key -sha256 -days 1024 -out root_ca.
